summary.Title: CNC operator
summary.Presentation:
For our customer in Esbjerg, we are looking for 2 CNC operators for quick start-up (who will operate CNC machines: Morbidelli x200 and SCM)
 
It is an advantage i

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For our customer in Esbjerg, we are looking for 2 CNC operators for quick start-up (who will operate CNC machines: Morbidelli x200 and SCM)

 

It is an advantage if you have knowledge of the Innovator program, but it is not a requirement.

 

The most important thing is that you have experience with CNC machines, high motivation for work and are a stable employee.

 

Working hours:

Day shifts 07.00 - 15.30 Monday to Thursday and 07.00 - 12.00 on Fridays

(37 hours a week)

 

Form of employment - Permanent job after Try & Hire course through Hytech (3 months)

 

Language - Danish or English

Salary - After qualifications

 

The company has many foreign employees, therefore it is not a requirement that you speak Danish.

 

Applicants from EU only.

 

Send your application, CV and relevant documents by clicking on button 'Søg på denne stillingen'

 

Applications are screened continuously, and we would request you to send it as soon as possible. As soon as the right candidate has been found, we will remove the job-add. However, due to receiving many applications, if we do not contact you within 7 days, your CV has not been chosen to continue in the process. 

 

If you need further information regarding the position or you have specific questions, you can contact Kim Christensen at kim@hytech.no
